Super DuckHunt

Duck Hunt is one of my favorite NES games. So when I got a VR headset I thought the game would work really well on the system. Of course a form of duckhunt already exists on VR, this being the game Duck Season. However that game ends up being more of a horror game, which isn't really my thing. So the only other option I thought would work was just to create my own version.

The game was created in Unity for the Oculus Quest 2, because of this an external computer is not needed. The game plays almost presicely like the
old NES game but with a 3D inviourment. With the only sprites from the old games returning being from the dog, ducks and UI.
All other assets are from the Unity asset store. However I made sure to not import any external code, only using my own.

Lastly I had plans to make the game multiplayer as well. And while I have another project as a prove on concept on Unity multiplayer. I don't think I ever finished that part of Super DuckHunt.

I have created a gameplay video of the game, but keep in mind that it is a video of an old build, so it might have some bugs.
